#summary Roadmap of the project

OrientDB is growing very fast. The issues list is every day longer with many cool features that are waiting to be introduced in: http://code.google.com/p/orient/issues/list

Below the roadmap with the main issues divided by release.

= Release 1.0rc9 (March 26th 2012): =
- Studio new look&feel and improved Query panel
- SQL: new sub query, INSERT accepts SET syntax like SQL UPDATE
- Schema: new support for metadata on property
- Many bug fixed, 35 issues in total

Full list: http://code.google.com/p/orient/issues/list?can=1&q=label%3Av1.0rc9

= Release official 1.0 (April 10th 2012): =
 * [http://code.google.com/p/orient/issues/detail?id=441 JDBC driver]
 * All the known bugs for 1.0 fixed
 * Open issues: http://code.google.com/p/orient/issues/list?q=label:v1.0

= Release 1.1 (July 2012): =
 * [http://code.google.com/p/orient/issues/detail?id=29 Execution of synchronous and asynchronous scripts]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/orient/issues/detail?id=160 Views]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/orient/issues/detail?id=161 Security at record level, like Unix file system]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/orient/issues/detail?id=7 Inverse relationships = Referential Integrity]

= Release 1.2 (October 2012): =
 * [http://code.google.com/p/orient/issues/detail?id=12 Pessimistic Transactions]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/orient/issues/detail?id=4 Stored procedure]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/orient/issues/detail?id=180 Time machine]
